Key Match Events: Orbelín Pineda scored a right-footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner in the 5th minute.
Roberto Alvarado set up Orbelín Pineda's goal with a well-placed header.
César Huerta scored a right-footed strike from close range in the 53rd minute.
Luis Romo delivered a perfectly timed cross that set up César Huerta's goal.
Luis Romo scored a right-footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner in the 57th minute.
Orbelín Pineda provided an assist for Luis Romo's goal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a sweltering 98-degree day.
The official attendance was reported as 25,271, though the actual crowd seemed much smaller.
Possible reasons for the sparse crowd include fan boycott, high ticket prices, intense heat, or the nature of the matchup.
